content: ईह् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (ईहते, ईहांचक्रे, ऐहिष्ट, ईहिष्यते, ईहितुं, ईहित) {@--1@} To wish, desire, long for; have in mind, think of (with <ab>acc.</ab> or <ab>inf.</ab>); ईहंते… अर्थसंचयान् <ls>Bg. 16. 12</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">7. 22</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 15</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 126</ls>; ऐहिष्ट तं कारयितुं कृतात्मा <ls>Bk. 1. 11.</ls> {@--2@} To endeavour to obtain. {@--3@} To aim at or attempt, endeavour, strive; माधुर्यं मधुबिंदुना रचयितुं क्षारांबुधेरीहते <ls>Bh. 2. 6</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 116.</ls> {@--4@} To take care of. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To impel, urge.
